thread.title: Warriors vs. Thunder: Live blog, score, highlights, updates, stats for Kevin Durant's OKC return
thread.title_full: Warriors vs. Thunder: Live blog, score, highlights, updates, stats for Kevin Durant's OKC return

author: Joe Rivera (Joseph.Rivera@performgroup.com)
title: Warriors vs. Thunder: Live blog, score, highlights, updates, stats for Kevin Durant's OKC return
text:
February 11, 2017 6:01pm EST February 11, 2017 5:55pm EST Saturday night, Kevin Durant returns to Oklahoma City for the first time since joining Golden State in July. Thunder G Russell Westbrook, Warriors F Kevin Durant (Getty Images) 
Updated at 6:01 p.m. ET 
Updated at 6:01 p.m. ET 
Who doesn't love a little Saturday night theater? 
The Golden State Warriors head to Oklahoma City to face off against Russell Westbrook and the Thunder. 
Of course, the biggest headline heading into this game is KD's return to Oklahoma City, and the type of welcome he'll receive. 
Chances are, it won't be pretty. 
In the pair of meetings between Golden State and OKC already this season, the Warriors are up 2-0. Golden State took home a 122-96 win on Nov. 3, and 121-100 win on Jan. 18. Durant has averaged just a shade under 40 points a game in both of Golden State's wins. 
Westbrook had a triple-double in the January affair and came up just four rebounds short in their November meeting. 
Saturday should show more fireworks in a hostile Chesapeake Arena. Warriors vs. Thunder updates 
— That's not how you spell coward … oh. Oh, oh wait a second. Hope every OKC fan can wear this shirt tonight in KD's return as a warrior #KowarD #KDsucks #Thunderup pic.twitter.com/AAJNeINCZj 
— Russell Westbrook is unsure if he and Kevin Durant will ever bro it up again. 
— Kevin Durant isn't messing around, hiring extra security for his visit to Oklahoma City. 
— Warriors forward Draymond Green is coming off a pretty epic night against the Grizzlies on Friday. Watch This
